alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Eaton; Ingham (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 15 at 9:12AM EDT until August 15 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of south central Michigan, including the following counties, Clinton, Eaton and Ingham. * WHEN...Until Noon EDT today. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Flooding may occur in poor drainage and urban areas. Storm drains and ditches may become clogged with debris. Area creeks and streams are running high and could flood with more heavy rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Heavy rain at times still continues with 2.9 inches already reported in Haslett. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
